Established 1987, Aéropostale is a specialty retailer of casual apparel and accessories, offering high-quality denim and fashion essentials at compelling values for young men and women.

Through its Aero Oneness platform, Aéropostale celebrates individuality, inclusivity and acceptance—an attitude which was adapted from its loyal customers and celebrated at the brand’s 1,000+ worldwide locations and online at aeropostale.com.
American Cafe is known for its 50's style All-American diner look and feel, offering guests a blast from the past and delicious food
Want the Best Deals on Smartphones? Shop all the Top Devices at AT&T Today. Easy Returns. Types: New Smartphones, Tablets, Wearables & Accessories

Hand rolled soft pretzels available in both sweet and savory flavors with dipping sauces. Enjoy them with a refreshing lemonade. Plus, pretzel dogs and pretzel buckets. Pretzel Perks app has exclusive offers and great rewards. With each purchase, you can earn points toward free pretzels.

Through the years, B&B has seen the coming of sound, color, widescreen, digital, 3D and countless other advances in stereo sound and projection. Our newest complexes offer the latest in sound and comfort, including DOLBY 7.1 Surround Sound and digital sound in all auditoriums, stadium seating, wide screens, high-back rocker chairs with cup holders, luxury electric recliner seating, Grand Screens® Marquee Suites® and digital projectors with 3D capabilities. Our extended family now consists of over 1,400 employees. Today, B&B operates theaters in towns of all sizes, and we've even opened multiplex theaters in many of the same places that once were home to our old-time single-screen and twin theaters. 

Check showtimes on their website www.BBTheatres.com/Ridgeland

Bath & Body Works is the apothecary of the 21st century. It is the authority dedicated to helping people find their own individual paths to well-being by bringing them the very best personal care products the world has to offer.
Women's Apparel, Men's Apparel, Shoes, Home, Bed & Bath, Beauty & Fragrance, Kids Apparel and more.

Looking for a custom t-shirt option for your next gathering? Stop by to see us and we'd love to assist you!

We offer fine furniture, home decor and unique wall art at affordable prices. We can help you decorate and furnish you living room, bedrooms, dining room, and more.

Fresh Gulf Shrimp is locally owned and originated in Memphis, TN with two locations. Options on the menu include, tasty po-boys, deep fried oreos, yummy fried okra, and more!

H&M is a global fashion brand offering quality styles at the best price points. From everyday basics to exclusive designer collaborations, you’ll find a wide assortment of affordable and versatile designs for women, men, teens, kids, baby, and home. With a strong focus in sustainability, H&M is committed to making the fashion industry a planet-positive one, so you can look good and feel good too.

Specializes in selling music-influenced apparel and accessories. Merchandise includes licensed merchandise from popular rock bands, and accessories, such as body jewelry and hair dye.

As one of the nation's largest apparel and home retailers, we strive to deliver style and value. At every touchpoint, customers will discover stylish merchandise at incredible value from an extensive portfolio of private, exclusive and national brands. Reinforcing this shopping experience is our customer service associates driving the Company's mission to help customers find what they love for less time, money and effort.

JD Sports elevates your everyday casual look to eye-catching new heights. Shop the latest footwear from brands that deliver performance, style and comfort to fit your on-the-go lifestyle. We have all the must-have sportswear and accessories from top brands like Nike, Jordan, Puma, adidas, Champion, Vans and The North Face plus store brand labels, such as Pink Soda Sport and Supply & Demand.

If you're looking for athletic slides, basketball sneakers, casual shoes, running gear and everything in between, JD Sports has you covered.

Journeys is a teen retail leader with an emphasis on footwear and unique specialty items including apparel, backpacks, hats and accessories. Journeys offers the most popular brands that cater to the teen lifestyle such as Vans, Converse, adidas, Timberland, Dr. Martens and UGG.

We can help you choose the perfect wedding gown, bridesmaid gown, prom dress, or help dress you for any special occasion. We have beautiful dresses for children all the way up to "mother of the bride". We provide you with friendly, personal, and professional service. Come see our beautiful store in Northpark Mall.

Every diamond is hand-selected to match beautifully and must pass exacting quality standards. Kay is diligent about the quality of our craftsmanship. We take the time to ensure the diamonds in your jewelry are well-matched to one another. Because we import more diamonds than any other company in the United States, we can offer you the largest and finest diamond selection at the best price.

Kids Foot Locker is a children’s athletic retailer that offers the largest selection of brand-name athletic footwear, apparel and accessories for children. Its stores feature an environment geared to appeal to both parents and children.
Trendy children's apparel for boys and girls from toddlers to teens.

King Kong Milk Tea was founded with the desire to provide quality healthy products and services to new and current milk tea enthusiasts in a peaceful environment. We have a variety of products from milk tea to fruit blends and smoothies to satisfy your taste buds. Milk tea is a beverage that contains milk combined with tea from fresh leaves and other key ingredients such as sugar and honey to fragrant spices. It is enjoyed in many cultures and countries.

Styles you’re obsessed with at prices you’ll love. As a leader in popularly priced apparel, Rainbow Apparel Companies Inc. is a national retail chain that specializes affordable clothing, shoes and accessories for Women, Juniors, Plus Sizes and Children.

  • Everyday Low Prices - No Need to Wait for a Sale
  • Size Inclusive - Trendy Clothing for Women & Juniors (0-15, S-XL) and Plus Size (14-24, 1X-4X)
  • Everything You Need to Complete Your Outfit - Affordable Accessories and Trendy Shoes up to Size 12

Our mission statement at REEDS Jewelers is simple: Your Family-Owned Jeweler ~ Trusted for Generations. It's our firm belief that a strong company's foundation is based on three principles: customer loyalty, a trusted brand, and long-term growth for success. From our first store founded in 1946 in downtown Wilmington, North Carolina to our newest lifestyle center stores, REEDS Jewelers continues to focus on these ideals. So relax, drop in for a visit, REEDS wants you to feel happy, comfortable and confident with your jewelry buying experiences.

Shoe Dept. Encore, apart of Shoe Show Inc., at Belden Village Mall in Canton, OH offers customers an impressive lineup of Aerosoles, Clarks, Columbia, Easy Spirit, Florsheim, Liz Claiborne, Nine West, Rockport, Rocky Boots, Skechers, Steve Madden, Timberland, Tommy Hilfiger, as well as branded athletics such as Reebok. Our products include ladies?, men?s and children?s shoes, handbags, accessories and shoe care.

Shoe MDK says it best! RESPECT YOUR SHOES!

Visit them on the Lower Level Center Court area - across from Great American Cookie.
Spencer's is the ultimate shop for edgy, humorous, collectible, novelty and gag gifts. Our stores carry the latest trendy clothing, t shirts and accessories.

Steak sandwiches, subs, healthy bowls, salads, and fries. We chop and slice the vegetables every morning. The smell of authentic, fresh-baked Italian rolls fills the restaurant all day long. We still fresh cut the fries every morning and afternoon from whole Idaho potatoes. We will not settle for anything less than all-white meat chicken with no added hormones and only use 100% USDA Choice steak. This attention to quality is and always has been part of the Steak Escape culture and our mission is to be the day’s highlight of everyone who walks through the door.

Stir Fry 88 is one of the fastest growing Chinese quick service restaurant concept, primarily located in the food court of enclosed shopping centers. The success of this unique Asian restaurant concept is resulted from its ability to consistently deliver high quality, authentic Asian products with excellent value. Our menu offers a wide variety of specially prepared dishes featuring traditional wok cooking, the finest ingredients and special sauces. At Stir Fry 88, the customers get to choose from a great variety of healthy mouth-watering dishes through attractively displayed entrees. Full color merchandising with a lot of flair and excitement offers todays sophisticated consumers a fresh alternative in food court dining.

At Sunglass Hut, our mission is to be the premier shopping and inspiration destination for the top brands, latest trends and exclusive styles of high quality fashion and performance sunglasses. Sunglass Hut has grown into one of the world’s leading destinations for the most sought-after high quality and performance sunglass brands.

Bite into something with a taste combination that positively explodes with sweet, gorgeous goodness for a good Sweet Taste'n experience! Choose from our assortment of gourmet apples, cheesepies, and strawberries! We also serve chips, nachos and other snack items to satisfy every craving.
